Summary: saw a bright object that rapidly disappeared after a strange experince while driving
divs: sighting details05\12\10 around 0845pm...driving in central il, followed by wife in separate vehicle...dark country hwy with no oncoming traffic- nothing unusual as i was driving on a curvy stretch of hwy until suddenly i did not feel in control of my vehicle, didn't feel as if i was still in vehicle, tried to tap the brakes and felt as if i was somehow hovering - could not reach the pedals...tried to steer my f150 into the ditch to avoid any potential accident but could not affect the steering wheel...uncertain of amount of time lapse but suddenly all was back to normal....could see that my wife was still following in her car. when i arrived home and parked my wife pulled in behind me and jumped out of her car very startled....the same thing happened to her in the same area (i wasn't going to say anything to her - i thought i might have had a stoke or something) as we were comparing our experience (in driveway, me facing east and her west)i saw a bright white round object above our barn to the east in the distance....i took off running towards it, when my wife turned around to see where i was going it suddenly vanished, appeared to have dropped below barn roofline.....anyone else experience anything similar?
trends: There have been no other sightings in Eureka
This sighting has never been favorited.
